targets.expr:
(
  sum(app_git_commit{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (git_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(version)
(
   0 * sum(app_version{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (version)
)
   + on(job) group_left(peer_name)
(
   0 * sum(app_peer_name{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (peer_name)
)
   + on(job) group_left(network)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_network{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (network)
)
   + on(job) group_left(cluster_hash)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_operators{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (cluster_hash)
) 
   + on(job) group_left(cluster_name)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_operators{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (cluster_name)
)

panels.description: Node is healthy if Beacon Node connected and synced and at least quorum peers are connected.
panels.title: Healthy

panels.description:
- **Peer**: The peer's name (inferred from their *charon-enr-private-key*)
- **You**: â­ï¸ is this local charon node
- **Connected**: Whether you are currently connected to this peer.
- **Direct**: Whether the connection is *direct* (ðŸ‘) or *relay* (ðŸ‘Ž) 
- **Latency**: The time messages take to travel to/from the peer.
- **Uptime**" The duration since peer was restarted.
- **ClockDiff**: Difference between local and peer's clock time. More than 2s is bad.
- **Attest**: Number of attestation duties performed in the time window.
- **PrepareAgg**: Number of aggregation preparation duties performed in the time window.
- **Aggregate**: Number of aggregations  duties performed in the time window.
- **Propose**: Number of block proposal duties performed in the time window.
panels.title: Peer Connectivity and Duty Participation

panels.description: Failed duties by type over time. Use data link to show logs.
panels.title: Failed duties by type

panels.description: Most frequent warnings and errors grouped by topic.
panels.title: Top Warns and Errors

panels.description: Average beacon node score for the whole time window.

targets.expr:
(clamp(app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 1 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 4 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 5 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 6, 1, 1) OR on() vector(0))
*
(
    (
0.5 * (1.0 - 10*(sum(increase(app_eth2_errors_total{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}[$__range])) / (sum(increase(app_eth2_latency_seconds_count{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}[$__range]))))) OR on() vector(0.5)
    )
    +
    (
        0.5 * (1.0 - clamp_max(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(app_eth2_latency_seconds_bucket{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}[$__range])) by (le)),1))
    )
)

panels.title: Avg Beacon Node Score

targets.expr: clamp(app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 1 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 4 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 5 OR app_monitoring_readyz{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"} == 6, 1, 1) OR on() vector(0)
